body: @Manofculture264, that's true i like that ending too, but if she join Mako which incidentally "hanging out freely with boys" is good for her development in social life but if she gonna like another loose gyaru, it's better Maintain her tomboyish attitude for her safety

I'm actually happy Akari didn't end up with MC in the end, IMO she was too good for him. Better to leave him with Koyomi who is willing to put up with his shit. The fact that they chose to end this with one girl is refreshing seeing most of these types of stories end with a harem route.
I WANT TO FUCK A GYARU

Twink MC

Twink MC
Akari off to become part of the women in society who have higher rates of divorce and low ability to parabond due to multiple sexual partners in the past. Smh

I thought the ending would be much worse because of the comments, but the ending is just bad, not terrible. He did end up with one girl after all, which is more impressive than a thoughtless harem end. All that development was wasted though, so I get why people are pressed

Worst ending ever, beta cuck mc.

The worst thing being him not even ne able to do a simple choice, akari had to leave this trash because he couldn't stop thinking with his dick.

@outofrealman Have to agree. I don't mind harem stuff but the guy in this one is a massive tool who only thinks with his dick. Feels like the ending was rushed as hell too, artist was probably not feeling up to doing anything more with it. Ending wasn't the worst I've seen, but definitely underwhelming to say the least. The dude acted like a horny teenager who played two girls and got off scott free, and really the biggest loser is the girl who had the most screentime + development too. Hard to say it doesn't feel like a bit of a slap in the face, luckily I just spam through webtoons since they're usually trashy.

Welp, moving on.
The ending is good, but the final, long awaited threesome scene is absolutely underwhelming. What a waste
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO AKA WAS OBVIOUSLY BEST GIRL FUUUUUUUUUUUUCK
This ending is like the worste to choose. The best ending imo would be a harem ending with both girls, but this is just disappointing

I do not see the guy loving any of them, so I rather both ditch him at the end. Even a harem end is fine, but this one goes for the worst one and try to have a romantic drama end (when it is not one) with one of the girl just backs out. Its so dumb when both girls love him anyway. He did it with Aka first, did a lot more with her, an it is literally the title of the Doujin. And she is the one who give up. It is just terrible. Either give him what he deserves, no girls, or the fantasy ending with harem FFS.
garbage ending.
A Passive Neutral ending is okay but j expected more... And I want more as well... A sequel would be nice 👌

Ooook,as a harem dude,final was bit disappointing,but....as a "normal" man (wtf i said that?really?),i think this is a true final that must be done.
(Still sad for no harem,don't judge me boisi'm that kind of guy that think in life sharing is caring,i've learned this in a strange but nice way).
Still tho,this is a must favorite,no discussion of this.
Waiting for the next work of this artist.
Everyone in the comments and whoever read this webtoon,have a good year.
that final is shit..
The only default in this story is that the guy in a horny idiot. Don't mind the salty ones it's a good story and it ends well.
oh well it is what it is..
i didnt want to regret reading it so i skipped to the end and now im happy tt i dont feel as sad

People cry because they build up a romantic relationship with both girls and then the one that most people like more dumped herself. That's why people cry. If it stayed physical then fine, but the story actually build it up to be a romantic one.
Why are you all crying? The ending would be trash if he wouldnt choose any of them. She did give A good reason that he's only horny all the time so i dont know why everyone is upset
Wtf! The ending is trash!
Seems like the ending was trash so it’s a skip from me
